data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 100 people living in South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the country of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Grytviken
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Grytviken, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.
Father, help the 10 believers in South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 90 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, we pray that the people of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.focus_label: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
